content:
A number of well-known folks in Genomics including Heidi Rhem - just published an article entitled:
Best practices for the interpretation and reporting of clinical whole genome sequencing. I find it to be helpful as a "map" to some of what we are doing..... a good document to look at for sanity checks at times (personal opinion). I added it to our Google Drive. You can find it here: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1TF1OMBchddpQw-mgqDzoIOoW99LRKMoD/view?usp=sharing
